headline: Jim Cramer Says Solstice is “The One to Own” and Called It “Inexpensive”
summary: Solstice Advanced Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:SOLS) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar recently. Cramer discussed the company’s nuclear business, as he stated: “Hey, I got another one. How about a nuclear energy idea that’s in the S&P 500 that I know you’ve never heard of. It’s called Solstice Advanced Materials. It’s the chemical […]
